pr_title: SAK-43989 add padding to grade names like A so the grade items align

timeline.message: SAK-43989 add padding to grade names like A so the grade items align

timeline.bodyText:
Does it matter that we use a generic callback vs one of the chartjs specific options https://www.chartjs.org/docs/latest/axes/#callbacks?
Any issue using ' ' vs ' ' ?
If not, looks good to me.
timeline.author: profmikegreene

replies.bodyText: my guess is nbsp would be escaped... ' ' works as expected here
